details:
* [CVE-2017-13089](https://security-tracker.debian.org/tracker/CVE-2017-13089)
Fix stack overflow in HTTP protocol handling.
* [CVE-2017-13090](https://security-tracker.debian.org/tracker/CVE-2017-13090)
Fix heap overflow in HTTP protocol handling.


For Debian 7 Wheezy, these problems have been fixed in version
1.13.4-3+deb7u5.


We recommend that you upgrade your wget packages.


Further information about Debian LTS security advisories, how to apply
these updates to your system and frequently asked questions can be
found at: <https://wiki.debian.org/LTS>
